meanings.definition: A person who makes or repairs objects made of tin.
meanings.sent1: The skilled tinsmiths crafted beautiful tin lanterns.
meanings.sent2: The tinsmiths in the workshop were busy shaping tin into various forms.
meanings.sent3: The tinsmiths decided to have a tin-themed party to celebrate their craftsmanship.
meanings.sent4: The tinsmiths' hands moved like lightning, transforming plain tin into works of art.
meanings.sent5: The clinking sound of hammers on tin echoed through the tinsmiths' workshop.
